Hi I\'m opening this thread because this night I dreamed that I was on YouTube and clicked on a The Clone Wars episode and after 5 secs I was awake and could\'nt sleep again ???...

Another one was that I demonstrated in a dictatorship that looked similar to my hometown and was supported by NATO tanks but the demonstration broke the military lines before they could even shoot once and then broke up very fast. Then I went to a bank and they kept me there until the bank closed and after that one staff went away and came back with a machine gun to shoot me down...

Four-six years ago I had a nightmare of nuclear attack. .-.

[me=Luigi]shudders

Oh god, this thread. I\'ve seen it on other forums, whahahaha

Coolest one I had was this:

I was driving the car with my family inside (I\'m 14, doesn\'t happen too often IRL), and all of the sudden there\'s a flash. I put the pedal to the metal and reach the top of some hill. As we drive across the summit, another nuclear explosion goes off in the town below. This was the most vivid dream moment I\'ve ever had. The shockwave overtakes and swallows the town, as the ground shakes and the windows on the car shatter. (vibration) All of a sudden the trees in front of me bend back and the buildings to my side are disintegrated as I wake up.

I dreamed this morning that I came to a friend of my. Lol, it happened: he wanted to test a LAN party on a game (and I didn\'t knew that till he asked me to come with me pc).

LOL!
Lol, the description of the nuking is 80% the same as the beginning of a book that my sister reads in school at the time...

What\'s the name of it? Wonder if I read it, forgot, then decided to dream about it... :b

Anyways, if you want nightmares, watch Threads. It\'s incredibly disturbing.

I\'ve had some odd dreams...

My most recent one involved being part of a team flying to Europa. The oddest thing is that I had memories of them even though they weren\'t from RL. We flew to Europa in a large craft. The idea was that we were to land, disassemble the ship, reassemble it into a base. We stayed there for about two weeks but on the 13th (oh... 13...) night I saw lights outside the window. I freaked out (because I have a habit of panicking when things act erratically) and I wanted to leave the next day. We stayed for our arranged time (2 more days) throughout which everything seemed like it was on time warp. We didn\'t see anything until we started taking down the base and reassembling it as a ship again. These robot things were marching towards us across the plain. We all hid, and the robots searched for us (they were very big). Eventually I decided that hiding and starving wasn\'t an option and that if they didn\'t leave we couldn\'t get home. So I stood up and surrendered. The robots knocked me unconscious.

This bit I can explain; I woke up in a room with one of my companions. At this point I really woke up because my mum was telling me to wake up (I have an alarm clock... It sounds like a fire bell but I never hear it).

Anyway thanks for reading.

LOL
